## ClickOutsideLimit interface

Limit to which the click event will trigger `clickoutside`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ClickOutsideLimit 
```

## Remarks

Currently only the parent option is supported

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [parent](./clickoutside.clickoutsidelimit.parent.md) | HTMLElement | Click event beyond the <code>boundingRect</code> of this parent node will not trigger <code>clickoutside</code> |
